Is there a god??!!??

Ok this is like the ultimate question next to the meaning of life but we all know the answer to that (42)
so here goes...
i amke these points after readin the bibe out of shear boredom

ok proof?? there is no proof at all, so what sparked off this religion of over 20 million people? no-one really knows....

ok my fave point here and its makes me laugh every time.....JESUS WAS A JEW!!!!
he was raised in palestine...a predominatly jewish country at the time.... why do i know this?? because the jews wernt kicked out of palestine untill bout 1500 years untill after 'jesus' death.... and the fact that christians have a go at the jews for killing him....well hello it wasnt the mexicans now was it. and after all christianity wasnt really established as a faith untill after he reborn on easter sunday.

and i LOVE the way the bible and churches show jesus as white..... erm look at the geography and modern day equivalent and you see that he was infact....coloured.... yes blasphemy (DEAL WITH IT)

oh oh oh and this is great the bible is full of insest and murder...its like a horror story....
adam and eve..... brother and sister...husband and wife....how the hell did humanity take of we should all be so inbred that we cant even stand up.

also after the 1st marriage some guy was killed... isnt that forbidden in the bible....so why the hell does the bible have so much death and sex in it.

i lead you to believe that christianity is a sham but thats my opionin whatever you think is down to you...but all eveidence makes me think that its a really fucked up religion.
